(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBG heartening)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB find)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (DT some) (NNS hawkers))
                  (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                    (ADVP (RB yet))
                    (VP (VB seem)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB have)
                            (VP (VBN heard)
                              (NP
                                (NP (DT the) (NNP Health) (NNP Promotion) (NNP Board) (POS 's))
                                (NN plea))
                              (PP (IN for)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (JJR less) (NN oil))
                                  (CC and)
                                  (NP (JJR more) (NNS vegetables)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(heartening-3, It-1)
aux(heartening-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, heartening-3)
aux(find-5, to-4)
xcomp(heartening-3, find-5)
mark(seem-12, that-6)
det(hawkers-8, some-7)
nsubj(seem-12, hawkers-8)
aux(seem-12, do-9)
neg(seem-12, n't-10)
advmod(seem-12, yet-11)
ccomp(find-5, seem-12)
aux(heard-15, to-13)
aux(heard-15, have-14)
xcomp(seem-12, heard-15)
det(Board-19, the-16)
nn(Board-19, Health-17)
nn(Board-19, Promotion-18)
poss(plea-21, Board-19)
possessive(Board-19, 's-20)
dobj(heard-15, plea-21)
prep(heard-15, for-22)
amod(oil-24, less-23)
pobj(for-22, oil-24)
cc(oil-24, and-25)
amod(vegetables-27, more-26)
conj(oil-24, vegetables-27)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN please))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, please-1)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN if)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (NP (DT a) (NN cholesterol) (NN problem)))
      (, ,))))


mark(have-3, if-1)
nsubj(have-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
det(problem-6, a-4)
nn(problem-6, cholesterol-5)
dobj(have-3, problem-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (VP (VB do)
        (VP (VBN cut)
          (PRT (RP down))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN lard))
              (CC and)
              (NP (JJ oily) (NN stuff)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (INTJ (VB please))
      (VP (VB stop)
        (S
          (VP (VBG reading)
            (NP (DT this) (NN post))))
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB lead)
                (NP (PRP you))
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (NN temptation)))))))))
    (. .)))


aux(cut-2, do-1)
root(ROOT-0, cut-2)
prt(cut-2, down-3)
prep(cut-2, on-4)
predet(lard-7, all-5)
det(lard-7, the-6)
pobj(on-4, lard-7)
cc(lard-7, and-8)
amod(stuff-10, oily-9)
conj(lard-7, stuff-10)
cc(cut-2, and-11)
discourse(stop-13, please-12)
conj(cut-2, stop-13)
xcomp(stop-13, reading-14)
det(post-16, this-15)
dobj(reading-14, post-16)
mark(lead-20, as-17)
nsubj(lead-20, it-18)
aux(lead-20, will-19)
advcl(stop-13, lead-20)
dobj(lead-20, you-21)
prep(lead-20, to-22)
pobj(to-22, temptation-23)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (MD can)
          (VP (VB afford)))))
    (NP (PRP it))
    (ADVP (CC and))
    (VP (VBP wish)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB pamper)
            (NP (PRP yourself))
            (ADVP (DT every) (RB now)
              (CC and)
              (RB again))))))
    (, ,)))


cc(wish-8, But-1)
mark(afford-5, if-2)
nsubj(afford-5, you-3)
aux(afford-5, can-4)
advcl(wish-8, afford-5)
nsubj(wish-8, it-6)
advmod(wish-8, and-7)
root(ROOT-0, wish-8)
aux(pamper-10, to-9)
xcomp(wish-8, pamper-10)
dobj(pamper-10, yourself-11)
dep(now-13, every-12)
advmod(pamper-10, now-13)
cc(now-13, and-14)
conj(now-13, again-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB then))
    (ADVP (RB here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB find)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN hawker))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't)
                      (VP (VB prioritise)
                        (NP (NN health))
                        (PP (IN over)
                          (NP (NN taste)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-3, then-1)
advmod(is-3, here-2)
root(ROOT-0, is-3)
advmod(find-7, where-4)
nsubj(find-7, you-5)
aux(find-7, can-6)
advcl(is-3, find-7)
det(hawker-9, a-8)
dobj(find-7, hawker-9)
nsubj(prioritise-13, who-10)
aux(prioritise-13, does-11)
neg(prioritise-13, n't-12)
rcmod(hawker-9, prioritise-13)
dobj(prioritise-13, health-14)
prep(prioritise-13, over-15)
pobj(over-15, taste-16)
